name: Don Pepin Garcia - Original Blue - Exclusivos
additionalNotes: Jose Garcia, otherwise known as Don Pepin, is the man behind some of the industry's hottest cigars.Â To create the Blue, a blend of 100% Nicaraguan tobacco is utilized. All Cuban-seed, this hearty mixture is made complete with a dark Nicaraguan Corojo wrapper. The cigar is full-bodied and full-flavored, boasting a rich, spicy bouquet of flavor with an assortment of earthy nuances. Eventful from start to finish and ultimately satisfying, Don Pepin Garcia Blue is a delicious, well-balanced cigar.
